scripts.user: mocha 'tests/scenarios/user/user.js' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports,reportFilename=user_report,reportTitle='User Tests',quiet=true --timeout 20000 ; node send-discord-notification.js reports/user_report.json
scripts.restaurant: mocha 'tests/scenarios/restaurant/restaurant.js' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports,reportFilename=restaurant_report,reportTitle='Restaurant Tests',quiet=true --timeout 20000 ; node send-discord-notification.js reports/restaurant_report.json
scripts.meal: mocha 'tests/scenarios/meal/meal.js' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports,reportFilename=meal_report,reportTitle='Meal Tests',quiet=true --timeout 20000 ; node send-discord-notification.js reports/meal_report.json
scripts.courier: mocha 'tests/scenarios/courier/courier.js' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports,reportFilename=courier_report,reportTitle='Courier Tests',quiet=true --timeout 20000 ; node send-discord-notification.js reports/courier_report.json
